page.title: 01Village Life
page.content: St.Albans and Watford are a few miles away from our block, which contains the villages of Bricket Wood and How Wood.Each has about 3 or 4,000 people;all the houses are well-spaced out,there are lots of trees,so it is a pleasant place to live in.There aren't many shops,and no cinemas or theatres,but it is easy to go to London or the big towns,if you have a car.Sports facilities are good. Farmland surrounds the villages, and there are plenty of woods, so it is semi-rural.Public transport is not all that good,and people living in the villages rely on cars.Motorways and main roads surround the area,which make it handy to travel.
